local_intent: Perceive the white carton, align, compute a top grasp pose, and verify the pose is available on the blackboard.
assumptions: White carton is visible and unobstructed.
Alignment from above is feasible within tolerance.
coherence_with_global: Implements the ComputeGraspPose step with verification following detection and approach, consistent with the global plan to grasp the white carton from the top.
